about_the_game:
Hit the trail in this open-world birdwatching adventure, featuring real-world bird species! Feather Trail is a labor of love by a former bird biologist turned solo gamedev.

You begin your journey in as a birder in Nearctica, a world of procedurally-generated pixel landscapes inspired by North American ecosystems. With a casual and non-linear storyline, the path ahead is up to you...

  • Enjoy a wide variety of bird species, presenting diverse behaviors and challenges for identification through timing-based minigames (soaring overhead, hiding in shrubs, diving underwater, etc.)
  • Challenge yourself to find the rare birds hidden in distinct habitats, migrating across the seasons
  • Build yourself a cozy home on the road by upgrading your campsite, where you return each evening. Entice birds to visit with birdfeeders!
  • Collect your "life list" through encounters in the field, cooperating and competing with local birders, and rising through the ranks of the Birding League
  • Conduct surveys and scientific research alongside the Ecology Institute, improving your mastery as an ornithologist
  • Trek to the outer reaches of the backcountry, and help the Nature Service to protect and improve the wilderness
detailed_description:
Hit the trail in this open-world birdwatching adventure, featuring real-world bird species! Feather Trail is a labor of love by a former bird biologist turned solo gamedev.

You begin your journey in as a birder in Nearctica, a world of procedurally-generated pixel landscapes inspired by North American ecosystems. With a casual and non-linear storyline, the path ahead is up to you...

  • Enjoy a wide variety of bird species, presenting diverse behaviors and challenges for identification through timing-based minigames (soaring overhead, hiding in shrubs, diving underwater, etc.)
  • Challenge yourself to find the rare birds hidden in distinct habitats, migrating across the seasons
  • Build yourself a cozy home on the road by upgrading your campsite, where you return each evening. Entice birds to visit with birdfeeders!
  • Collect your "life list" through encounters in the field, cooperating and competing with local birders, and rising through the ranks of the Birding League
  • Conduct surveys and scientific research alongside the Ecology Institute, improving your mastery as an ornithologist
  • Trek to the outer reaches of the backcountry, and help the Nature Service to protect and improve the wilderness

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support. Examples: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is coming soon and more detailed requirements to be provided ahead of release
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 or Apple M1 (or above)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support. Examples: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (Kepler), AMD Radeon HD 7750 (GCN 1.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is coming soon and more detailed requirements to be provided ahead of release

name: Feather Trail

short_description: Identify real-world bird species through timing-based minigames while exploring an open world of pixel habitats. Build your life list & compete with local birders. Conduct field research & master ornithology. Adventure off-trail into the backcountry. Build a cozy campsite to return to each evening!
